directions: Cook potatoes in large pot of boiling salted water until tender, about 30 minutes. Drain. Return potatoes to pot. Stir over low heat until excess moisture evaporates. Add butter; mash potatoes until smooth. Bring milk to simmer in saucepan. Remove from heat. Add goat cheese; whisk until melted. Add milk mixture to potatoes; whisk until smooth. Stir in arugula. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 3 pounds (about 5 large) russet potatoes, peeled, quartered
5 ounces soft fresh goat cheese (such as Montrachet), crumbled
1 cup (packed) chopped arugula leaves (about 2 large bunches)
title: Arugula and Goat Cheese Mashed Potatoes
